size_t  datalen,
RIL_Token  t 
)

RIL_REQUEST_SET_CLIR Sets the CLIR status.

Parameters:
[in] data "data" is NULL
datalen length of the data parameter received
t token passed to the RIL command request
Returns:
none
Abort:
none
Note:
CLIR activation is not supported because the 3GPP specification does not allow CLIR activation; we remember the CLIR type and use the same in RIL_REQUEST_DIAL
